titles: By the King a proclamation for the preuenting of the exportation of woolles, wool-fels, yarne, fullers earth, and woad- ashes and of hydes, both tand and raw, out of this kingdome.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
publisher: By Robert Barker and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,
notes: "Giuen at Our Court of White-Hall, the seuenteenth day of April, in the sixt yeere of Our Reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
keywords: Exports --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
Wool industry --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
Hides and skins trade --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
